<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AccessControlUtils</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>This is a wrapper Script Include to allow executing authorization utility scriptables: - MSI de-customization API</description> <name>AccessControlUtils</name> <script><![CDATA[var AccessControlUtils = Class.create(); AccessControlUtils.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
deleteCustomerUpdatesForAuditedEmptyACLs: function (aclList) { global.GlideFixStuff.deleteUpdateSetsForAuditedEmptyACLs(aclList); },
type: 'AccessControlUtils' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-11-06 17:31:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8df33ed24f12311092d53c11b1ce0b30</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AccessControlUtils</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Schema for contextual security" source="com.glide.security_schema">1d23f4603c31311068bcf327dfe37f0c</sys_package> <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8df33ed24f12311092d53c11b1ce0b30</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-11-06 21:29:40</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
